songs.title: Cinderella
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Girl you can see my vision
But you can’t see yourself through my eyes
When I came to my senses
I knew you were sent to be mine
Pick your head up you the baddest chick, ay
We can chill out or we can have a sip
It’s up to you babe, whatchu wanna do babe
I’m on your clock tonight just tell me what’s the move babe

[Pre-Chorus]
Trust me when I tell you that you’re the baddest girl to ever have me captivated with your mind
So don’t be insecure babe this love is a sure thing I just wanna build you up so you can shine

[Chorus]
You’re my Cinderella girl
Tonight it’s just about us two
Sit back and let’s elevate
Keep your eyes on me it’s just us in the room
You’re my Cinderella girl
Tonight it’s just about us two (about us two, girl)
Sit back and let’s elevate
Keep your eyes on me it’s just us in the room

[Verse 2]
Let me tell you a blessing
Less is more, girl I know I learned my lesson
The way you did, you will regret it
You know I love the way you [?]
Ooh girl, I got a thing for ya
Fuck around and buy a ring for ya
I know they slept on you before, but I ain’t sleepin’ on you

[Chorus]
You’re my Cinderella girl
Tonight it’s just about us two
Sit back and let’s elevate
Keep your eyes on me it’s just us in the room
You’re my Cinderella girl
Tonight it’s just about us two (about us two, girl)
Sit back and let’s elevate
Keep your eyes on me it’s just us in the room

[Outro]
You're my Cinderella girl
